job.title: Principal Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: pTitle Principal Site Reliability EngineerppLocation  New York City Onsite ppDuration  6 MonthppInterview Process  1 Internal and 2 Client Interview VideoppnbspppnbspppppPrincipal Site Reliability Engineer Productivity amp Conferencing Services Workplace Technology EngineeringppnbspppThe Principal Site Reliability Engineer for Productivity Services is responsible for the technical design and operations of productivity solutions used globally by client employees and partners These solutions will enable the workforce to create share and collaborate on content from anywhere at anytime built upon the Microsoft 365 and Azure platforms This technical leadership role is expected to apply a software engineering mindset to system administration topics elevating the availability reliability and security of solutions while reducing operational costsppnbspppnbspppSpecific solutions includeppEmail and calendaring Exchange Outlook ProofpointppFile storage and sharing OneDrive DropboxppDocument creation Word Excel PowerPointppVideo audio and text chat Teams SlackppMeeting room conferencing and booking Cisco CondecoppstrongnbspstrongppstrongSpecific responsibilities includestrongppLead the technical design implementation and operation of productivity solutions with an emphasis on security systems architecture and automated provisioningppContribute to the site reliability engineering center of excellence including the creation of standard artifacts best practices and learning plansppParticipate as a standing member of the engineering review board to evaluate trade studies approve solution designs and maintain the overall workplace system architectureppParticipate in the weekly agile process to resolve technical impediments and assist in user story definition and sizingppDesired characteristics includeppAbility to communicate effectively both written and verbally to stakeholders and engineersppAbility to build effective crossfunctional relationships in support of delivering enterprisewide solutionsppAbility to execute within a fastpaced agile process ppnbspppstrongQualifications includestrongpp5 years experience designing implementing and operating Microsoft 365 services at enterprise scalepp5 years experience programming including shell scripting PowerShellpp5 years experience designing scalable and reliable enterprise solutions including considerations for multitier software architectures networking and securitypp3 years experience with cloudbased infrastructure and platform services Azure AWSpp2 years experience automating the deployment of enterprise solutions using infrastructureascode configuration management and CICD technologies Office 365 and Exchange certifications preferredppExperience with data loss prevention archiving eDiscovery and compliance preferredppMasters degree in computerrelated field preferredp
